text: The different combinations were not superior to paclitaxel/cisplatin regimen in termes of OS.However, trends in favor of paclitaxel/cisplatin regimen were noted in terms of OR, PFS and response rate.Patients receiving experimental doublets did not report significant differences in health-related quality of life, neuropathy, or pain from those who received the control doublet (paclitaxel/cisplatin).
